headline: Which US companies are pulling back on diversity initiatives?
summary: Facebook and Instagram parent company Meta Platforms Inc. joins a growing list of companies that are pulling back on diversity, equity and inclusion initiatives.  Like others before it, the social media giant cited a U.S. Supreme Court decision in July 2023 that outlawed affirmative action in college admissions.  Conservative activists have gone after companies — both in the courts and on social media — seeking to set a similar precedent in the working world.

raw.headline: Which US companies are pulling back on diversity initiatives?

headline: What Sent Ford Spiraling 18% in 2024?
summary: Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F) and General Motors have long been rivals, so much so that when one coughs the other generally sneezes, and vice versa.  The question is: What sent Ford spiraling while its rival thrived?  While rival GM was beating estimates and raising guidance multiple times in 2024, Ford struggled.
